text: Anwar Bakht Choudhury (; born 15 June 1959) is a British diplomat. He was Governor of the Cayman Islands from March 2018 until he was recalled in June 2018 after less than three months in post. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom Category:Governors of the Cayman Islands Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:People from Sylhet Division Category:Politicians from Buckinghamshire
title: Anwar Choudhury
